DOC.brief_summary: The optimal surgical treatment insertional Achilles tendinopathy remain unclear . The purpose study evaluate long-term outcome surgical treatment compare patient report outcomes Insertional Achilles Tendinopathy ; Achilles tendon debridement , excision calcaneal exostosis , Strayer procedure , secondary repair Achilles flexor hallucis longus ( FHL ) transfer Achilles tendon debridement , excision calcaneal exostosis , Strayer procedure , secondary repair Achilles without FHL transfer .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Trial Evaluate Effectiveness Transferring Flexor Hallucis Longus Tendon
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year old Diagnosed insertional Achilles tendinosis history physical exam Confirmed xray MRI Calcification Achilles insertion gastrocnemius tightness . Failure follow nonoperative treatment great 6 month : *shoe modification physical therapy immobilization home exercise program . In addition , participant must intact flexor hallucis longus tendon . Patients fail surgery patient diabetic neuropathy .
